known_issues: Admin account is incorrectly showing status 'Not Active' despite being an admin; needs a fix focused only on the admin account without impacting existing working features.

existing_features.title: Ensure the Profile and Vehicles pages reflect the corrected admin activation status without introducing new UI flows or altering existing working features.

new_feature_requests.summary: Update the backend activation-status check so the allowlist admin principal is always considered activated for vehicle registration, ensuring the admin account never shows a 'Not Activated' status in the UI.

projectName: Fix admin account incorrectly showing Vehicle Registration status as Not Activated
